GSD.product_version: versions from v5.1 to before v5.15.46
GSD.description:
mm, compaction: fast_find_migrateblock() should return pfn in the target zone

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit 20e6ec76aed47c65ee2dd7636f4911396c9396c7, it was introduced in version v5.1 by commit 70b44595eafe9c7c235f076d653a268ca1ab9fdb. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mm, compaction: fast_find_migrateblock() should return pfn in the target zone
